mapper.select: /* 내 농장 설문 전체 리스트, 상세보기 */ SELECT user_t.user_id, my_farm_t.farm_no, survey_t.survey_no, survey_t.temperature, survey_t.humidity, survey_t.survey_result, survey_t.survey_etc, survey_t.survey_date FROM survey_t join my_farm_t on survey_t.farm_no = my_farm_t.farm_no join user_t on user_t.user_id = my_farm_t.user_id WHERE user_t.user_id = #{id} and my_farm_t.farm_no = #{no} order by survey_no desc LIMIT ${length} OFFSET ${start} ;

/* 내 설문 상세보기 (모달 창 띄울 시 사용)*/ SELECT user_t.user_id, my_farm_t.farm_no, survey_t.survey_no, survey_t.temperature, survey_t.humidity, survey_t.survey_result, survey_t.survey_etc, survey_t.survey_date FROM survey_t join my_farm_t on survey_t.farm_no = my_farm_t.farm_no join user_t on user_t.user_id = my_farm_t.user_id WHERE user_t.user_id = #{id} and my_farm_t.farm_no = #{farm_no} and survey_t.survey_no = #{survey_no} LIMIT 1;

/* 설문 온습도 및 상태값 리스트 출력(그래프) */ SELECT survey_t.temperature, survey_t.humidity, survey_t.survey_result FROM survey_t join my_farm_t on survey_t.farm_no = my_farm_t.farm_no join user_t on user_t.user_id = my_farm_t.user_id WHERE user_t.user_id = #{id} and my_farm_t.farm_no = #{no} order by survey_no desc LIMIT 50;
/* 현재 농장 상태 가져오기 (센서테이블)*/ SELECT user_id, farm_no, temperature, humidity, sensor_date FROM sensor_data_t WHERE user_id = #{id} and farm_no = #{no} order by sensor_data_no desc LIMIT 1;
